title: How Do You Help an Adult Child Navigate Mental Illness?
description:
Today, we talk with a woman powerless to help her mentally unstable adult son, and a husband wondering if he is causing the communication problems in his marriage. Then, John talks with The Minimalists about everything from befriending your coworkers to what a life well lived really means.
Lyrics of the Day: "With a Little Help From My Friends" -Joe Crocker
